Treatment self-administered participant four time daily out-patient basis . Participants rate pain intensity score ( NRS ) rest movement , pain relief score ( PRS ) cool soothe sensation . After leave clinic , participant continue complete schedule pain intensity pain relief assessment answer question cool sensation answer question paper diary card . The investigator ( designee ) measure ankle swell via 'figure-of-eight ' method treatment Days 1 ( Baseline ) , 3 , 7 10 . Participants continue treatment pain free 10 day , whichever occur first .
